entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 8 April 2023
